room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: She was amazing as a zombie! We had so much fun we did it for a birthday party!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Planned a birthday party for the zombie escape room. Abby the general manager was amazing handling our reservation and she was actually our zombie too! Dean was our host, we couldn't have had a better time. Thank you both for an evening of memories!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The zombie was so entertaining! What a fun way to spend your Saturday!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It's was such a fun experience, great actors (Dean & Jordan) that add a great vibe to the escape room. Would totally recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was a great escape room! The zombie twist made the experience more intense and exciting. Not only are you paying attention to the clues but you have to constantly pay attention to where the zombie is and what he is going. Special thanks to the actors and the staff!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: As a part of my birthday celebration, my friends and I participated in the zombie adventure with Kaz and Danielle. Kaz, the zombie, was the best part. He made the event hilariously funny and just an overall blast! I really enjoyed the taunting and the jesting that Kaz did with us. I laughed the entire hour. Danielle was a great host as well. She was supportive and very helpful. We would've died without her help. If you want to have a great time this is your event. If you want to solve puzzles that are tricky, then this is the place for that too. I would highly recommend this event!! I will definitely book another event with Kaz and Danielle!
